Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you. Our product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and expectations. Given its unique features and benefits, it is worth $800,000 to us. However, considering the importance of this opportunity for both parties, I am willing to offer it to you at an exceptional price of $750,000. This offer includes all the features you're looking for, plus some exclusive bonuses tailored to enhance your experience with the product. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss the details further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
